successes.title: AdTrap - The internet is yours again
successes.description:
Ad free internet for all of your devices.  

Tired of ads?

Pledges.description: Our sincerest thanks for supporting our project, plus access to backer-only updates and early order access.  Help us achieve an ad free internet again!  AdTrap wouldn't be possible without your support!
Let everyone know you've conquered internet ads!  AdTrap T-Shirt. Specify shirt size. Shipping included.

Early Bird: One AdTrap at an incredible price.  You can't beat this deal!  Every WiFi enabled device you own, ad free.
FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $12 for everywhere else.

Slightly Late Early Bird: One AdTrap at a great price!  Every WiFi enabled device you own, ad free.
FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $12 for everywhere else.
One AdTrap!  Every WiFi enabled device you own, ad free!  FREE SHIPPING within the US or Canada, add $12 for everywhere else.
Meet the AdTrap team in Palo Alto at our launch party Jan 11th.  You'll need to arrange your own travel, we'll do the rest!  It'll be a lot of fun, we promise ;)
The Ultimate Package:  Meet the AdTrap team in Palo Alto at our launch party Jan 11th.  We'll cover flight and lodging from wherever you are.
